page.title: 04FARMING AROUND KINGLASSIE :1
page.content:
The farms around Kinglassie and Auchterderran are mainly{mixed farms,} being involved in both{arable}and {pastoral}farming.
Somewhere in the region of{50%}of the agricultural land is under{permanent } {grass}for grazing or grass for hay and silage. Bowhouse Farm has a high proportion of its land under grass but this is because the farmer runs a dairy herd producing milk for a domestic milk round.
The other main crop produced in this area is{barley.}The bulk of the barley is used for{animal fodder}but some will go for{malting}to local whisky companies, providing that the quality is good enough.
